Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
Oh hiiiiiii. I work in traveling sales, and I've got
wares I just know you'll love.

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
It's nice to meet you. I'm <BLUE>Susanne</BLUE>. My colleague
Reiner told me all about you.
<PAGE>
Goodness, your farm's as big and lovely as he
said. I'm sure it turns a handsome profit for
you...
<PAGE>
Hm? Oh, nothing. Just talking to myself. Soooo,
I've got a couple items I think would be a GREAT
fit for you. Care to take a look?

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
Here, how about I show you a few things?

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
I have one in particular I think is just PERFECT
for you. Here we go!
<PAGE>
It's a <ITEMNAME0>, and right now, I
have <MOJI0> available for sale.
<PAGE>
It'll cost you onlyyyyy...

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
I have one in particular I think is just PERFECT
for you. Here we go!
<PAGE>
It's a <ITEMNAME0>, and right now, I
have <MOJI0> available for sale.
<PAGE>
It'll cost you onlyyyyy...

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
I have one in particular I think is just PERFECT
for you. Here we go!
<PAGE>
It's a <ITEMNAME0>, and right now, I
have <MOJI0> available for sale.
<PAGE>
It'll cost you onlyyyyy...

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
<ITEMNAME1>G! Whoa! This price is
so good, even I kind of want to buy it!
Money: <MOJI0>G

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
Really? You will? Woohoo! I knew I liked you!

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
Here you go. Thank you for your generous
patronage.
<PAGE>
When I have more items I know you'd like, I'll
stop by again.

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
Aww, you don't want it? Oh well, guess you
can't win 'em all. But promise me you'll buy
something next time, 'kay?

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
Here you go. Oh wait, it looks like you've got a
full bag. I'll just have it delivered to your house
later.
<PAGE>
Thanks for your generous patronage! When I
have more items I know you'd like, I'll stop by
again.

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
...but it looks like you've got a full bag. Can't
really give this to you if you don't have anywhere
to stow it, right?
<PAGE>
Oh well. I'll come by again sometime, so be sure
to have plenty of free space then so you can buy
a lot, okay?
<PAGE>
Have a nice day!

<NAME_MOB_ZUZANE>
Oh noooo, you don't have enough money! And
after I trudged all the way out here, too... Oh
well.
<PAGE>
I guess I'll go visit the other farmers while I'm in
town. I'll come by again sometime, so be sure to
make a lot of money before then, 'kay?
